channel.title: Planet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the planet of the day.

item.title: List of exoplanets discovered in 2023
item.description: This list of exoplanets discovered in 2023 is a list of confirmed exoplanets that were first reported in 2023. For exoplanets detected only by radial velocity, the listed value for mass is a lower limit. See Minimum mass for more information.
